initial.comments: skips the finalize screen where the user chooses to save as incomplete or finalized and instead saves as finalized

display.text: Have any changes occurred to the exterior of the facility that could affect the current stormwater drainage patterns? If yes, describe them.
Have there been any non-incidental spills since the last inspection? If yes, attach information regarding the spill(s) to this form
Are there any operations or storage of materials outside that could impact stormwater quality? If yes, describe them.
Are good housekeeping procedures, as discussed in the Stormwater Pollution Prevention Plan, being implemented and followed
Is the locomotive storage area free of leaking fluids or spilled fuel
Is traction sand build-up interfering with the operation of the oil water separator system and/or the stormwater conveyance system (if present)
Are catch basins clean and free of debris
Is there any evidence of dry weather discharges to the catch basins
Are drums/containers enclosed/covered, labeled, and closed
Are spill response materials properly stored and easily accessible
Are bulk storage tanks and material delivery areas free of drips and leaks
Are dumpster lids closed and drain plugs intact
